name: Yggdrasil (Wolf of Victoria)
description:
A 2 Player battle to the death!

Play as animals of the tropics and unfamiliar as they duke it out in a fight for Odin's power held within the great world tree Yggdrasil!

Let out your inner Norseman and kill a friend or two!

2 Players Only!

Xbox 360 Controllers Recommended

P1 : Gamepad(Keyboard)

Movement: Left Stick (Directional Arrows)

Jump: Button 1 (Spacebar)

Attack 1: Button 3 ('J' Key)

Attack 2: Button 2 or 4 ('M' Key)

P2 : Gamepad(Keyboard)

Movement: Left Stick (W,A,S,D)

Jump: Button 1 ('I' Key)

Attack 1: Button 3 ('P' Key)

Attack 2: Button 2 or 4 ('O' Key)

Quit Game: Esc
